title: Aatrox could use a better 1st item, here is an idea
body:
Soulfire Edge (rapier and gauche)

50% Attack Speed
200 Health
20 Armor
20% CDR
7% Movement Speed

Passive: Windspeakers Favor--10% increase on self healing

Would you buy an item like this for Aatrox if it existed?

Obviously this would be a high priced item, close to trinity force maybe

replies.body: That's preeeeeetty fucking broken lol.
Haha what and Trinity Force isnt over the top on champions that can spam its spell blade and great use out of every stat?

> [{quoted}](name=DonnieDarkin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iHHe9Bje,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-03-27T00:37:08.359+0000)
>
> Haha what and Trinity Force isnt over the top on champions that can spam its spell blade and great use out of every stat?

It's roughly around 4000G and over all the stats are on the low side though.
Maybe trinity force is pretty broken? And your item would need to cost like 4000 gold or so.

"Make an item only one character would ever build lol"

and that's why i don't go to aatrox players for insight into game design

I play Aatrox too, but it's not all of us doing this... just a 'few' outspoken individuals :^)

Edit: This item is overloaded.
Obviously the stats could be adjusted. What Trinity Force is not overloaded?

It is pretty overloaded if you ask me. So then why are you trying to make another overloaded item? Also like others have said, you shouldn't make an item for only one specific champion in mind. That's how abuse cases happen when champions not designed for things suddenly realise that they can better utilise the item than the intended champion(s) for example, Runeglaive Ezreal.

If anything, League is literally built off of generic cover the base items and specialist items. It's plain, it's boring but that's how it works in LoL. If this game was more Dota 2 like, we might be able to see good item variety. Having too much of a generalist item where stats tend to rule doesn't seem like too good of an idea.

Yeah because Riot really nails it, right? Like when they left tank ekko in a broken ass state for like..what? 6 months? Or all the champions they nerfed into oblivion? Or the fact that the same champions are repeatedly picked and banned. Yup, GREAT game design. 128 champions, feels like 20 to choose from.

Meanwhile xin and others get the max benefit from items like {{item:3078}}, but heaven forbid there as an item that gave Aatrox more of what he needed

{{item:3153}}.

Aatrox's problem right now is that he's undertuned. Not that he needs some magical item ginned up just for him and him alone.

Since you're not fairly good with Aatrox it seems, especially with op.gg pointing out your win rate is roughly 45%, I'm gonna give you a small guide. Do what ever you wish with it.

{{item:3153}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3072}}  {{item:3053}} {{item:3047}} 

https://gyazo.com/4094af8826e984615ba8c3bbad792c9a

3 Life Steal Quints
AS Marks
Armor Seals
Scaling MR Glyphs

Go nuts.

Dude Ive played like 15 games with him in ranked on this account. Its ROUGH relearning when you are used to toggling blood thirst and blood price a certain way with the old Aatrox. Furthermore, my placements gave me 2 akfs and 2 total trolls. It wasn't a good start

Also, unless I am asking for your god damn advice on a post, dont offer it up. No one likes unsolicited advice. That is a pretty hard rule in life dude.  But since you are probably some unsocialized nerd with no concept of how to interact with others, you wouldn't know that

Thats WAY to many stats on a single item. 

If anything, you want a buffed version of zephyr that builds out of a BF sword and a stinger...

Is it though?Trinity Force exists. There is no AD, lifesteal, or spellblade or armor reduction. So it is VERY lacking in some respects.

And yes I do want a buffed version of Zephyr but Riot deleted, so clearly they don't want it.

Maybe something like this because of {{champion:19}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:75}} and {{champion:122}}.

50% Attack Speed
300 Health
10% CDR
5% MS

Windspeakers Favor- 10% increase on self healing.
I like that too

See the problem here isnt that Aatrox would be the only one building this, imagine a yasuo building this against you, where he already has a pd and maybe a tabis. that doesnt sound too fun to play against.
He wont benefit from it as much as Aatrox will. It doesnt give crits, and 10% self healing is pretty substantial on Aatrox

350 HP
50 Armor
10% CDR

Unique Passive - Increase in self healing.

or

500 HP
50 Armor
15% Attack Speed

Unique Passive - Increase in self healing.

A bit more balanced.

worthless for Aatrox without Attack Speed

30 Armor

There are other items that can give attack speed. At the moment what he really lacks is a defensive item that he can build that fits his kit. The potential item I listed; swap the 5% ms for AS and that'd be balanced.
